# Getting Started {.unnumbered}


## Users (without Nix background)

- pull Images

```bash
docker pull ghcr.io/gtrunsec/workflow-template.desci
```

- Enter the devshell with dockerImages

```sh
git clone https://github.com/GTrunSec/workflow-template.git
cd workflow-template

docker run -it -p 8888:8888 -v "$(pwd):/work" -v "/etc/localtime:/etc/localtime" --entrypoint /bin/bash ghcr.io/gtrunsec/workflow-template.desci
```

### Commands Menu

- show devshell menu

```bash
menu
```

- run `jupyterlab` with `jupyenv` (docker reuqired port-forward flag)


```bash
jupyenv -- lab --ip 0.0.0.0 --port 8888
```
